answers.answer: That happened to me when I was 39 weeks. It might mean you're about to start getting stretch marks because that's exactly when I got mine. I swore I was gonna look like a scene from a horror movie and just burst open at my stomach lol
Lol that's what it feels like for me too, it's especially sore when she starts kicking me cause the skins stretching even farther and it seriously feels like the skin on my stomach is bruised...
Yup that's exactly what happened to me. But I also had a larger baby. My doctor didn't tell me that I got diabetes while I was pregnant and so my son ended up being large. 9lbs 13ozs. Lol

Oh geez well i might be in the same boat then because I had to go for an ultrasound last week at 33 weeks beCause I was measuring to big and sure enough she's a lil bigger than she should be right now, and I haven't gotten any stretch marks my whole pregnancy and I thought I might have been in the clear cause I'm almost there but I guess not! I can just tell with the way my stomach has been feeling the last few days that stretch marks are coming...

Yeah I was the same way! I was SOOOOO disappointed when I got mine. 39 weeks. Like come on. Almost the whole thing with no stretch marks and them BAM. Haha. But its all good. With the right stuff they will go away eventually! So don't worry (:

question: I'm 34 weeks and the skin on my stomach is so sore it's ridiculous! It feels like my skins so tight it's about to just tear right open, does this mean stretch marks are coming and has this happened to any of you??
title: so frikkin tight!
